name: TextField
description: A UI element that lets the user input and edit text

instanceFields.label: IsDelayed
instanceFields.description: If true, the value property isn't updated until either the Enter key is pressed or the TextField loses focus

instanceFields.label: Multiline
instanceFields.description: If true, the TextField supports multiple lines of text

instanceFields.label: Label
instanceFields.description: The label text displayed next to the TextField

instanceFields.label: SelectionColor
instanceFields.description: Color used to highlight selected text inside the field

instanceMethods.label: RegisterValueChangedEventCallback
instanceMethods.description: Registers a callback to be invoked when the value of the TextField changes

instanceMethods.label: SetValueWithoutNotify
instanceMethods.description: Sets the value of the TextField without triggering any change events
